title: Leclerc2019
author: Leclerc2019
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================To participate you need a BSC WalletNO KYCBOUNTY POOL =  $10 000 in tokens at the time of distribution• Discord – 15%• Telegram – 10%• Twitter – 15%• Reddit – 10%• Shilling – 10%• Blog – 15%• YouTube – 15%• Linkedin – 10%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:•  If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.•  Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.•  If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.•  Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.•  The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.•  The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.•  Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.•  You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).•  Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.•  We will update the stakes [weekly].Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign). 5 posts per week: 2 stake 10 posts per week: 3 stake 15 posts per week: 4 stake 20 posts per week: 5 stake25+ posts per week: 6 stake  Rules:  1. You must join the Telegram group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the Mr. Potato) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project telegram chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. The words "hi, hello, bye, goodbye, etc." are not counted.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram!6. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 or @kateee110) Code:Week # : Telegram Profile Link Spreadsheet #: Amount of posts per week:  Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign).5 posts per week: 1 stake10 posts per week: 2 stake15 posts per week: 3 stake20 posts per week: 4 stake25+ posts per week: 5 stake Rules: 1. You must join the Discord group: https://discord.gg/mrpotatotoken2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the Mr. Potato project) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project discord chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the Discord chat!6. Words of greeting "hi, hello, etc." and words of goodbye "bye, goodbye" are not counted.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 and @kateee110)2 Stakes per post (Max of 10) per weekRules:1. You must join the Discord and Telegram chat https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotoken2. Must post in other NON-SPAMMY telegram crypto group - Shilling groups is preffered3. Must include our telegram handle @cashskullin all your post 4. Must include website link - https://cashskull.com/5. Add $MrPotato to your watchlist (CoinMarketCap) https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/mr-potato-token/6. Vote for $MrPotato (CoinMarketCap) https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/mr-potato-token/7. Comment in the projects community once a week (CoinMarketCap) 8. Add $MrPotato to Favourites (Coingecko)9. Vote for $MrPotato (Coingecko)Code:Week # :Week # :Telegram Profile LinkSpreadsheet #:Links to your work:.Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join the Telegram and Discord group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotoken2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mrpotatotoken3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #MrPotatoNFT #Airdrop #memetoken5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.6. All report must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about MR.POTATO and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).1 post: 1 stake per week2 posts: 2 stakes per week3 posts: 3 stakes per week4 posts: 4 stakes per week5 posts+: 5 stakes per weekkRules:1. You must join the Telegram and Discord group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotoken2. You must publish posts in cryptogroups about the project in which there are at least 5000 participants.3. The post must contain at least 50 words and include a link to the project4. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our site.5. You can not publish posts with a frequency of less than once every 10 hours.Code:Week # :Linkedin ProfileSpreadsheet #:[b]POSTS[/b]1.2.3.4.5.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. Subscribe subreddit r/MrPotatoToken / https://reddit.com/r/potatonation2. Upvote posts in subreddit r/MrPotatoToken / https://reddit.com/r/potatonation3. Comment on subreddit r/MrPotatoToken (please, use Chat GPT) 4. Comment in "Daily General Discussion" on subreddit r/CryptoCurrency about MrPotatoToken (Please use Chat GPT)  * This task require user to go reddit.com/r/CryptoCurrency, open pinned post which's name "Daily General Discussion", then comment something positive about MrPotatoToken.5. Comment posts from this Reddit URL (please, use Chat GPT)  https://www.reddit.com/search?q=MrPotatoToken%20*This URL is feed of all publications about MrPotatoToken on Reddit.6. Upvote posts from this Reddit URL (please, use Chat GPT) https://www.reddit.com/search?q=MrPotatoToken%20*Airdropers will comment and upvote other airdropers. 7. Publish TEXT post about MrPotatoToken anywhere on Reddit (please, use Chat GPT) 8. You must join the Telegram and Discord group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotokenCode:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma:  Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. You must join the Telegram and Discord group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotokenBest Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakes Rules:1. You must join the Telegram and Discord group: https://t.me/mrpotatotoken and https://discord.gg/mrpotatotoken2. Video must be 2 minutes long.3. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.5. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers.6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission.7. We would accept any positive video about MR.POTATO, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.8. No more than two videos from one person.9.The MR.POTATO website should be on the screen of your video. Here is the link to the site: https://mrpotatotoken.com/=========================WEEK 1 (31.05-06.06)=========================
